title: Didn't receive my star guardian icon
body: Both of my two accounts did the star guardian quiz two days ago but still didn't receive the icon. Anyone can help me with this?

replies.body: It can take up to 72 hours for the icon to unlock on the account, sometimes longer.  Some players may also receive it before others.  As long as you are logged into the site for the quiz, you'll be fine.  The goodies will come!
